text: Design an algorithm, find the most frequently used word in a book
Find the most frequently used word in a book.
Use a hash table, traverse and mark the hash table.
If the book's size is known, if  any word is found to be used > 50%, then skip any new words in the following traversal and only count old words.
What if the book size is unknown?
It is O(n) and O(n) time and space.
